casebody.data:
RAFAELI, LLC, and Andre Ohanessian, Plaintiffs-Appellants,
v.
OAKLAND COUNTY and Andrew Meisner, Defendants-Appellees. SC: 156849
COA: 330696 Supreme Court of Michigan. December 14, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of plaintiffs-appellants to extend the time for filing their brief is GRANTED. The brief will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before February 13, 2019.
